title: ATF Tax Stamp Elimination - Get Your Trust Today
description: Breaking news: The $200 ATF tax stamp is gone as of January 1st, 2026. Never been a better time to buy a trust. Visit 199trust.com

sections.text: Breaking News for Gun Owners: The 200 Dollar Tax Stamp Is Gone.
As of January 1st, 2026, the ATF has eliminated the two hundred dollar tax stamp requirement for both eForm 1 and eForm 4 applications.
This applies to individuals AND trusts. What does this mean? If you've been waiting to file for a suppressor, short-barreled rifle, or any NFA item—the financial barrier just disappeared.
sections.search_query: suppressor short barreled rifle NFA tactical

sections.text: But here's what most people don't realize: there's never been a better time to set up a trust.
Current ATF processing times are moving faster than ever. eForm 1 applications are being approved in just 24 to 48 hours. eForm 4 submissions are processing in 40 to 60 days on average.
sections.search_query: fast speed clock timer quick processing

sections.text: A trust gives you something no individual application can: flexibility. Multiple users. Easier transfers. No fingerprints. No photos. No problems.
Without the two hundred dollar tax stamp hanging over your head, the cost of a trust is now the smartest investment you can make for your NFA collection.
sections.search_query: investment smart money value financial decision

sections.text: Don't wait. Check out 199trust.com today. Get your trust set up properly, get the forms filed, and own your NFA items the right way.
